Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
The images above provide a quick intro on using the sitemap. In the sitemap, you can move existing pages or create new pages by drag and drop, similar to editing content.

You can access several options for each page by clicking on the Show menu icon that is displayed right on the sitemap entries. 

Go ahead and try the sitemap editor. Afterwards, come back and continue the introduction tour with the "back office" of OpenCms.

Link.Text: Continue with step 5: Launchpad and Explorer
